projects.title: Revlv Solutions Inc
projects.description: Revlv is a spin-off group of a mixture of professionals from different fields of Engineering, Computer Science, Digital Arts and Marketing. We take pride that our talents are home-grown and our software products are in-house developed from scratch. We are a team of creative and logical thinkers.

projects.title: ABS-CBN Foundation
projects.description:
Green initiative is an organization of nature loving personalities under the most prominent Television station in the Philippines, ABS-CBN Foundation. They ought protect the Philippine environment especially the most visited site-viewing places on Philippines to preserve its beauty for future tourist attractions. We designed and developed the Green Initiative website to help them spread and continue their noble advocacy for the environment.

projects.title: Philippine Coastguard
projects.description:
Philippine Coast Guard is the oldest and only humanitarian armed service of the Philippines. Presently, PCG is now recognized as the third uniformed armed service of the country, following the the Armed Forces of the Philippines and Phillippine National Police.

projects.title: Chic Francisco
projects.description: When Chic turned 60 in April 2009, she decided to close her school. But being a workaholic, she soon embarked on a new project. Believing that her easy-to-understand and easy-to-follow pattern-making method would significantly enable and empower a multitude of people world-wide, she started her e-learning project.
